snippet: Though South Africa said the application was still being processed, a representative of the Tibetan spiritual leader said he had been told it would be rejected.
abstract: Tibetan spiritual leader Dalai Lama is denied visa by South African government to attend Nobel peace conference in Cape Town.
lead_paragraph: Though South Africa said the application was still being processed, a representative of the Tibetan spiritual leader said he had been told it would be rejected.

headline.main: Dalai Lama Said to Be Denied South African Visa
headline.print_headline: South Africa: Dalai Lama Is Denied Visa
